properties.name: List of Interface Templates
properties.description: Array of interface templates for dropdown

properties.name: List of Device Types
properties.description: Array of device types for dropdown

Master workflow for complete switch onboarding process.

This workflow orchestrates the following steps:
1. Add Switches to Site - Creates devices in NetBox with planned status
2. Create Prefixes and IPs - Sets up IP addressing from Catalyst Center PnP data
3. Claim Device via PnP - Claims devices in Catalyst Center and provisions them
4. Run pyATS Tests - Validates device configuration and connectivity

Inputs (via dropdown selection):
- Tenant: NetBox tenant
- Site: NetBox site
- Device Type: Device type model
- Device Role: Device role
- Uplink Interface: Interface template for uplink
- Serial Numbers: Comma-separated device serial numbers

Prerequisites:
- All sub-workflows must be imported
- NetBox and Catalyst Center targets configured
- SSH host configured with pyATS venv for tests
- Devices must have contacted Catalyst Center (visible in PnP)

properties.script:
import json
import sys

tenants = json.loads(sys.argv[1]) if sys.argv[1] else []
sites = json.loads(sys.argv[2]) if sys.argv[2] else []
device_types = json.loads(sys.argv[3]) if sys.argv[3] else []
device_roles = json.loads(sys.argv[4]) if sys.argv[4] else []
interface_templates = json.loads(sys.argv[5]) if sys.argv[5] else []

tenant_list = json.dumps([{"id": str(t.get("id", "")), "name": t.get("name", "")} for t in tenants])
site_list = json.dumps([{"id": str(s.get("id", "")), "name": s.get("name", "")} for s in sites])
device_type_list = json.dumps([{"id": str(dt.get("id", "")), "name": dt.get("model", ""), "part_number": dt.get("part_number", "")} for dt in device_types])
device_role_list = json.dumps([{"id": str(dr.get("id", "")), "name": dr.get("name", "")} for dr in device_roles])
interface_template_list = json.dumps([{"id": str(it.get("id", "")), "name": it.get("name", "")} for it in interface_templates])

properties.prompt_body:
Please provide the following information for switch onboarding:

• **Tenant**: Select the NetBox tenant
• **Site**: Select the site where switches will be added
• **Device Type**: Select the switch device type
• **Device Role**: Select the device role
• **Uplink Interface**: Select the uplink interface template
• **Serial Numbers**: Enter serial numbers (comma-separated)

properties.script:
import json
import sys
import re

# Parse JSON objects from dropdown selections
tenant_obj = json.loads(sys.argv[1]) if sys.argv[1] else {}
site_obj = json.loads(sys.argv[2]) if sys.argv[2] else {}
device_type_obj = json.loads(sys.argv[3]) if sys.argv[3] else {}
device_role_obj = json.loads(sys.argv[4]) if sys.argv[4] else {}
uplink_obj = json.loads(sys.argv[5]) if sys.argv[5] else {}
serial_numbers_input = sys.argv[6]
device_types_json = sys.argv[7]

# Extract IDs and names
tenant_id = tenant_obj.get('id', '')
tenant_name = tenant_obj.get('name', '')
site_id = site_obj.get('id', '')
site_name = site_obj.get('name', '')
device_type_id = device_type_obj.get('id', '')
device_role_id = device_role_obj.get('id', '')
uplink_interface = uplink_obj.get('name', '')
serials = serial_numbers_input

# Extract site number from site name
site_number_match = re.search(r'\d+$', site_name)
site_number = site_number_match.group() if site_number_match else '1'

# Get part number from device types list
device_types = json.loads(device_types_json) if device_types_json else []
part_number = next((dt.get('part_number', '') for dt in device_types if str(dt.get('id', '')) == device_type_id), '')

print(f"Tenant: {tenant_name} ({tenant_id}), Site: {site_name} ({site_id})")

actions.name: Create Prefixes and IPs in NetBox from Catalyst Center
actions.title: Create Prefixes and IPs

properties.result_message:
Switch onboarding process completed successfully!

Steps completed:
1. Added switches to NetBox site
2. Created prefixes and IP addresses
3. Onboarded switches via Catalyst Center PnP
4. Ran pyATS network tests
